dcterms:creator: P. W. Battaglia
R. A. Jacobs
R. N. Aslin
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the Bayesian integration of visual and auditory signals for spatial localization, allowing for the study of how these modalities can be combined to enhance spatial perception.
dcterms:title: Linear Cue Combination

dcterms:creator: J. M. Beck
P. E. Latham
A. Pouget
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the concept of marginalization in neural circuits using divisive normalization, which is crucial for understanding how neural computations can be optimized.
dcterms:title: Coordinate Transformation

dcterms:creator: O.-S. Kwon
D. Tadin
D. C. Knill
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into the unifying account of visual motion and position perception through Kalman filtering, which is essential for understanding dynamic visual processing.
dcterms:title: Kalman Filtering

dcterms:creator: W. J. Ma
M. Rahmati
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the neural implementation of causal inference in cue combination, providing a framework for understanding how the brain infers causality from sensory information.
dcterms:title: Causal Inference

dcterms:creator: J. M. Beck
P. E. Latham
A. Pouget
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on stimulus demixing, which is essential for understanding how the brain separates different sources of information from a mixture.
dcterms:title: Stimulus Demixing

dcterms:creator: A. T. Qamar
R. J. Cotton
R. G. George
J. M. Beck
E. Prezhdo
dcterms:description: This dataset examines trial-to-trial, uncertainty-based adjustments of decision boundaries in visual categorization, shedding light on how humans adapt their decision-making strategies.
dcterms:title: Binary Categorization

dcterms:creator: W. J. Ma
V. Navalpakkam
J. M. Beck
R. R. Berg
A. Pouget
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates the behavior and neural basis of near-optimal visual search, providing insights into how visual attention is allocated in complex environments.
dcterms:title: Visual Search
